plot: With SATs around the corner, Betty comes face-to-face with someone from her past; Jughead makes a bold move against the Gargoyle Gang.

The SATs are around the corner, and everyone deals with it differently. Archie has a lot to catch up on and fears that he won't be able to graduate with his friends. His relationship with Veronica is also on thin ice as he is haunted by the aftermath of the bear attack and becomes a shell of his former self, a "stranger" to his friends. After everything, Veronica's fling with Reggie may ultimately end up being more than either of them anticipated. Betty pays her father a visit when Alice takes her plans to convince Betty to join The Farm a step too far, but Betty soon gets caught up in Hal's mind games. Jughead and FP use an undercover Fangs to get to The Gargoyle King and, after unmasking him, plan to finally put an end to Hiram and Claudius' reign of terror... until an unexpected gunshot sets everything off course and may put them right back where they started.—snowflakeaudrey
